column1: The said service minute in clause 12,  sets out the qualifications necessary to be appointed

column2: to a position in post of Class  III  of the SLTES.  There are six such requirements. The first
that the applicant be a citizen of Sri Lanka;
that the applicant be of good character, in good health, and be  prepared to serve
that  the  age  at  the  time  of  the  application  for  appointment  be not less  than  22
years and not more than 30 years.
